The heavy-duty design provides a stable rolling tier dryer rack for drying various kitchen items. It easily supports up to 80 lbs with all rods in use.

✨ 𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐑𝐞𝐝𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐝: Beyond a typical roll up dish drying rack over the sink, our multifunctional kitchen organizer transforms seamlessly into a vegetable drainer, non-slip trivet, sink organizer, sponge holder, cutting boards, dish racks and kitchen storage. ✨ 𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐞 𝐔𝐭𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Featuring 9 stainless steel tubes anchored by silicone, our over the sink dish drainer drying rack and collapsible roll-up drying system maximizes counter space. The folding design allows for compact storage, offering an uncluttered and organized kitchen environment when not in use.

✨ 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐭-𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐅𝐨𝐨𝐝-𝐒𝐚𝐟𝐞 𝐀𝐬𝐬𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞: Coated with FDA food-grade silicone, our dish drying rack and kitchen sink organizer withstands heat up to 400°F (204°C), frost resistance and is BPA-free. This kitchen dish rack accessory doubles as a trivet for hot pans and defrosted food, kitchen sink cover for counter space ensuring safety and confidence.

✨ 𝐃𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞, 𝐂𝐮𝐭𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 & 𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐓𝐨 𝐂𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐧: Our above sink dish drainer over the sink drying rack features a detachable and cuttable design that fits perfectly in most sizes of sinks. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Over the Sink Dry Rack Rescues Tiny Kitchens
reviews.reviewText: The Over the Sink Dry Rack has proven to be a true lifesaver in my tiny kitchen, where counter space is virtually non-existent. With a dual sink setup and no dishwasher, this foldable and stainless steel dry rack has become an indispensable addition for efficient dish drying without the need for counter space.The standout feature of this dry rack is its ingenious design. Able to fold into thirds, it maximizes space when needed and neatly tucks away when not in use. This flexibility is a game-changer for tiny kitchens, providing a practical solution for drying dishes over the sink, utilizing space that would otherwise go unused.Crafted from stainless steel, the dry rack strikes a balance between being lightweight and sturdy. It can effortlessly hold all my dishes without the worry of breakage. The durability of the materials ensures that the rack withstands regular use and stands the test of time, making it a reliable companion in my kitchen.The convenience of having a dedicated space for dish drying directly over the sink cannot be overstated. It eliminates the need for a separate drying mat or counter space, streamlining the dishwashing and drying process. The over-the-sink placement also allows excess water to drain directly into the sink, keeping the kitchen tidy.In conclusion, if you find yourself with minimal counter space and no dishwasher, the Over the Sink Dry Rack is a practical and space-saving solution. Its foldable design, stainless steel construction, and lightweight yet sturdy build make it an ideal choice for efficient dish drying in tiny kitchens. I highly recommend it for anyone looking to optimize space and streamline their kitchen routines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is so nice to have. Provides additional space for dishes, washing fruit, etc. it rolls up too. Easy to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great drying rack!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great drying rack! It folds into thirds, and is on the thinner side without sacrificing any strength in the stainless steel, making it great to store when not using. You can use on your counter or over your sink-- it fits on both sides of my sink (I have one square sink, one long rectangle shaped one). It saves a lot of counter space using over your sink, which I love. It has silicon sides, which make it easy to fold and also won't scratch your surfaces, as well as hold the rack in place. My husband normally does the dishes, and was really intrigued and excited about using this drying rack. This is a great rack and I recommend getting one if you're in the market for a sleek looking, easily stored drying rack!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Substantial and multi functional.
reviews.reviewText: I love multi use items, I have limited space, so really helps to have items that do not take up space and offer limited use, this item being able to offer a trivet use and or help at the sink (draining) is wonderful, the flat bars keep items stable ( even more critical if you are dealing with a hot pot)Nice size, it too big or too small… yet serves so many helpful functions… also nice weight, does not feel weak and flimsy.Highly recommend…. Great for kitchen, rv, and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does fit quite yet but easy fix!
reviews.reviewText: The bars are a little longer for our sink but they can be easily cut since the rubber parts can be removed and reattached.This will not only be great for dishes too big for the dish washer and the regular drying rack but also for veggies and other items that need to be set out for a little.It looks easy to clean and might even go in the dishwasher (I will have to test). My hope is the rubber part doesn’t stretch easy or dirties irrepairily over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The rollup drying rack is magnificent!
reviews.reviewText: My kitchen is very small, and I have almost no counter space. I do have a double sink with no dishwasher. I placed the rollup metallic drying rack on top of the second sink. This allowed me to get rid of my old drying rack that took up the small counter top. Any water left on the dishes after washing them drain inside the sink. I doubled my counter space by using the drying rack as a place my for my cutting board. I cut vegetables, fruit, bread and cheese. Easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for our sink
reviews.reviewText: I love the versatility of this drying rack and that it's not so obtrusive to the counter. It easily fits to any width sink as you can cut in between the slots. Would recommend for anyone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect!!!!!! It frees up counter space, is convenient to have next to you at the sink when cleaning vegetables. So handy in the kitchen to save on needless dishwashing and keeps the kitchen tidy. Roll up and store easily.
